tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CropWaterUsage (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  water_usage FLOAT,
  irrigation_schedule VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    irrigation_date DATE,
    duration DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    water_amount FLOAT NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE crop (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(255), water_requirement FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE water_source (source_id INT PRIMARY KEY, source_name VARCHAR(255), water_capacity FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE irrigation_log (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, schedule_id INT, water_used FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    day INT NOT NULL,
    water_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE farm (
    farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT NOT NULL,
    farm_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    farm_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE farm_crop_mapping (
    farm_id INT NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (farm_id, crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm(farm_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id)
);
